summary: This document certifies the existence of Southern Financial, LLC, registered in the Virgin Islands. It outlines the company's management structure, initial capital, and limitations of liability for its managers, specifically naming Jeffrey Epstein as the initial manager.

persons.name: Gregory R. Francis
persons.context: Gregory R. Francis certifies the existence of Southern Financial, LLC, as the custodian of corporate records.

persons.name: Greg J. Ferguson
persons.context: Greg J. Ferguson is named as the organizer of Southern Financial, LLC, and signed the document.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the initial manager of Southern Financial, LLC.

connections.description: Greg J. Ferguson organized the company that Jeffrey Epstein manages.

events.title: Formation of Southern Financial, LLC
events.description: Southern Financial, LLC was registered to conduct business in the Virgin Islands.

locations: 9100 Port of Sale Mall, Suite 15, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: Southern Financial, LLC was registered on February 25, 2013.
Jeffrey Epstein is named as the initial manager of Southern Financial, LLC.
Greg J. Ferguson is the organizer of the company.
The company has a legal existence as a Limited Liability Company.
The document was certified by Gregory R. Francis, Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands.
